title: Fascinate My Heart
overview: The love and dreams of youth in the city. A heart throbbing TV series showing the various lifestyles of city youths in their 20s. Easy going Ye Rin, in her senior year of art school, has a crush on Suk Chan who has been her friend since childhood. She feels empty because there is no spark between them and Ki Jo, a nude model and a bartender steps in. Nam Hee who wants to be a musical actress likes Ki Jo but is afraid she'll be hurt.
